reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an amazing professor! His lectures are engaging and he truly cares about his students.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her material, but her lectures can be a bit hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Brown is very helpful and provides great resources.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Williams is knowledgeable, but her lectures are very monotonous and hard to stay awake through.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Dr. Jones makes coding fun and understandable.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is very approachable and her classes are insightful, though the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Dr. Miller's lectures are clear, but his exams are tough. Be prepared to study a lot.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about literature and inspires her students to think critically.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Great professor! Dr. Anderson explains complex topics in a simple and clear way.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: The course material is interesting, but Dr. Lee's teaching style is a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas is a brilliant philosopher and his classes are mind-opening.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White is very knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris makes a difficult subject accessible. He’s always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Chemistry II
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an excellent professor! Her passion for chemistry is contagious.

reviews.subject: American Government
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Dr. Robinson's lectures can be overly complex.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis encourages creativity and provides great feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Walker knows his stuff, but his teaching style isn’t very engaging.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is very thorough and her exams are fair. A lot of material to cover though.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Young is an exceptional professor! He makes difficult topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is a great lecturer and makes the material relevant to current events.
